commands.config.getwithtype: Config for %s of type %s found at %s
commands.config.noconfig: Config for %s of type %s not found
neoforge.configuration.uitext.title: %s Configuration
neoforge.configuration.uitext.notonline: §cSettings in here are determined by the server and cannot be changed while online.§r
neoforge.configuration.uitext.notlan: §cSettings in here cannot be editied while your game is open to LAN. Please return to the main menu and load the world again.§r
neoforge.configuration.uitext.notloaded: §cSettings in here are are ony available while a world is loaded.§r
neoforge.configuration.uitext.unsupporte: §cThis value cannot be edited in the UI. Please contact the mod author about providing a custom UI for it.§r
neoforge.configuration.uitext.undo.toolt: Reverts changes on this screen only.
neoforge.configuration.uitext.reset.tool: Reverts everything on this screen to its default value.
neoforge.configuration.uitext.restart.ga: One or more of the configuration option that were changed will only take effect when the game is started.
neoforge.configuration.uitext.restart.se: One or more of the configuration option that were changed will only take effect when the world is reloaded.
neoforge.configuration.uitext.restart.re: §c§lYour changes will have no effect until you restart!§r
